headline: Cirrus SR Series G7+ unveiled with its Safe Return Emergency Autoland, becoming the first piston-powered aircraft with Garmin Autoland
summary: Garmin (NYSE: GRMN) today announced its award-winning Autoland system has been certified for the newest SR Series model, the SR Series G7+. The Cirrus Safe Return™ Emergency Autoland system in all new SR20, SR22 and SR22T aircraft marks the first piston-powered aircraft equipped with Garmin's autonomous emergency landing system. In the event of an emergency, such as a pilot incapacitation, Safe Return will control and land the aircraft without human intervention. All SR Series G7+ aircraft now c
